metadata.title: CVE-2020-10994 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
In libImaging/Jpeg2KDecode.c in Pillow before 7.1.0, there are multipleout-of-bounds reads via a crafted JP2 file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-10994` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-pil - 7.0.0-4ubuntu0.1
python3-pil.imagetk - 7.0.0-4ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pillow package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.0.0-4ubuntu0.1').
pillow-python2 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
